    • Sidebar

      public Sidebar​(@NotNull @NotNull net.rgielen.fxweaver.core.FxWeaver weaver, @NotNull @NotNull org.springframework.context.ConfigurableApplicationContext ctx, @NotNull @NotNull javafx.scene.layout.StackPane childButtonPane, @NotNull @NotNull javafx.scene.layout.StackPane contentPane, @Nullable @Nullable ImagePane backImagePane, @NotNull @NotNull javafx.scene.control.ToolBar toolBar)

      Fully-Parameterized Constructor

      Constructs a new Sidebar instance used to contain SidebarBookshelf.

      Parameter Details

      1. Child Button Pane â€” Refer to getChildButtonPane() for additional information.
      2. Content Pane â€” Refer to getContentPane() for additional information.
      3. Back Image Pane â€” Refer to getBackButton() for additional information.
        1. If the specified value is null, a new ImagePane is automatically constructed.
        2. To access the aforementioned automatically-constructed ImagePane, call getImagePane() on the Back Button.
        3. The ImagePane can then be added to a JavaFX Region and the Back Button will work as intended. No additional setup is required.
        4. Note that every JavaFX Node instance can have a maximum of one parent at any given time.

      Sidebar Contents Pattern

      1. Sidebar: Contains and manages a group of UIBookshelfs in the form of SidebarBookshelfs.
      2. SidebarBookshelf: Contains and manages a group of UIBooks.
      3. UIBook: Displayable implementations that contain, manage, and display the contents of UIPages.
      Parameters:
      childButtonPane - The StackPane that the ImageButtons linked to each UIBook in the currently selected SidebarBookshelf are displayed on.
      contentPane - The StackPane that the contents of the currently displayed UIBook based on the currently selected SidebarBookshelf are displayed on.
      backImagePane - The ImagePane on which the Back Button is displayed on.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the childButtonPane parameter is null.
      NullPointerException - If the contentPane parameter is null.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()

      Initializes this Sidebar and associated components and functionality..

      Details

      1. Executed on the JavaFX Thread.
      2. The calling Thread blocks until initialization process is complete.
      3. initialize() can only be called once.
      4. Calling initialize() more than once on a single Sidebar instance can (and likely will) result in unexpected and/or unpredictable runtime functionality.

      Initialization

      1. Calls getBackButton().initialize() to initialize the Back Button assigned to this Sidebar.
      2. Calls bookshelvesProperty().forEach(initialize()) to initialize all SidebarBookshelves in this Sidebar.
      3. Selects the first (bookshelvesProperty().get(0)) SidebarBookshelf in this Sidebar.

    • isBookshelfSelected

      public boolean isBookshelfSelected​(SidebarBookshelf menu)

      Checks if the specified SidebarBookshelf is currently selected or not.

      Parameters:
      menu - The SidebarBookshelf being checked.
      Returns:
      True if the specified SidebarBookshelf is currently selected, false if it is not.
      See Also:
